name: Partisan Gauge
description: Determines your 'partisan alignment', based on news sites accessed in your browsing history
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://d3js.org/ https://ajax.googleapis.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/ https://code.jquery.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/; object-src 'self'
